label: Selly Sally
narrative: This persona joined the Developer Relations Foundation because they believe their customer is here. They have a sales background orintention. A consultant who is offering services or trying to sell a SaaS tool, event planner trying to sell sponsorships, research organization selling data, etc. fall into this persona.

x-likes: Share many of the same likes as a marketer
Meeting people who are in buying decision roles.
x-dislikes: Share many of the same dislikes as a marketer
Communities that are unwelcoming of sales or marketing people even when they play by the rules.
goals: Persuade somebody to purchase a product or service from them.

communications: Before promoting your activity, evaluate whether there are norms or conventions where it would be welcome to the majority of folks who may be sensitive to noise and distractions.
sales: Listen to the norms of the community before engaging.
Develop a relationship first to understand if your product or service is valuable before trying to make a transaction.
